name: Juicy Game Of life
description:
Conways game of life! 

Sorry I couldn't upload as a web version -- some of the packages I used don't like to render in HTML 

Left click to place cells, right click to remove them. 

After you place down some cells, make sure you click on the "Play" button to step through the simulation - that's the fun part!

The (only) rules of the simulation:

If a cell has 1 or fewer neighbors, it dies (as if from loneliness)

If a cell has 4 or more neighbors, it dies (as if from overpopulation)

If a cell has exactly 3 neighbors, it becomes alive (as if from reproduction)

All of the pretty patterns arise from just these couple of rules! 

Music by the Blue Dot Sessions, made with Shapes (by Freya Holmer)
